timeline.message: DisruptorFutures now have traces for each portion.

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be volatile? Specifically I'm thinking of a race condition where one thread assigns runningSpan, but another cancels the future and runs the listener: thread 2 won't see thread 1's write. Maybe this is ok if GC is sufficient to clean out 'leaked' spans
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: nah, this is only updated in the disruptor thread, so it's safe, see the TracingEventHandler.
replies.author: felixdesouza

timeline.author: jeremyk-91
